title: we cant log u in because u may be offline...

replies.body: I'm having the same problem, my connection is fine, but it says i'm offline, help plz

> [{quoted}](name=Darwazah,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=97hdzfGa,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-06-14T17:25:16.701+0000)

fix it now!!!!

Hey,

im experiencing the same problem atm, your tip on how to fix it didn't work out for me.. 
Thanks anyway :)
i got leaverbuster from it watdo

I have also the same problem, I started a game and appeared a message that said something like we cannot connect, revise ur connection. I closed the client and I opened it again and it appear me that message above the username. I hope i dont get banned for that
yes need to Solve this problem before i get ban -.-
same here, totally bugged, believe me my connection is fine and stable

From the title of your post it sounds like you're having difficulties keeping a stable connection between your network and our game servers. Take a look through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get to the bottom of the issue.

Let me know if you've got any other questions!
its happening to me now, help plz
